author: P𝔥𝔢𝔬𝔫𝔦𝔵
text: In nature fathers support their children and I see him in way that destroyed me mentally and in same time I have no feelings for stranger we lie to each other as humans as I lie to everyone.we come to those pathetic social media to throw our pain but at least we can share ours 😂 https://t.co/k6UxVg2HKK

author: P𝔥𝔢𝔬𝔫𝔦𝔵
text: I don't need his love, it's funny to doubt his love.Funny. That's why I see men are not necessary to me. mom taught me to do everything by myself ..even if he helped me because he is afraid of something I don't know but he always says you don't deserve it.. He is just stranger https://t.co/k6UxVg2HKK

author: P𝔥𝔢𝔬𝔫𝔦𝔵
text: You literally said everything that I feel at this moment... Like I could say he is the negative person in my life...he is ruining every hope that we try to build... That's why I started to hate making family...I see no difference between any man and my dad and I will never forget https://t.co/k6UxVg2HKK

author: P𝔥𝔢𝔬𝔫𝔦𝔵
text:
#SUHO_GreySuit @weareoneEXO
Since I have hard taste in everything.. My heart is melting with this show, Suho worked really hard and he breaks all the expectations..I want to hear him singing those songs over and over again..omg my thanks for singing Suho https://t.co/fxPM6GrxS0 https://t.co/qOvJ7kga9s

author: P𝔥𝔢𝔬𝔫𝔦𝔵
text: #SUHO_GreySuit @weareoneEXO #SUHO I really loved it.. I have never seen a singer moves from note to another, the songs are totally different from each other, the words are related to each other as one story..., even suho shows new style and intelligence in making music pretty

author: P𝔥𝔢𝔬𝔫𝔦𝔵
text: #SUHO_GreySuit @weareoneEXO #SUHO you really worked so hard. I am proud of you very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very much... 👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏This album wins...like a fine art not everyone able to understand.. Really

author: P𝔥𝔢𝔬𝔫𝔦𝔵
text:
#SUHO_GreySuit
@weareoneEXO each song has a different meaning... I really loved the whole songs and Suho showed more sides of him.. His vocal, the rhythm and the speed of the songs are very different wich made me realize how unique, I am really amazed with the whole album,

author: P𝔥𝔢𝔬𝔫𝔦𝔵
text: #SUHO_GreySuit @weareoneEXO you have never fell in love with human...your freedom in your hands...until you fell in love..that's why I said you didn't fall in love....but I can say it's a pretty song it's very attractive and I really love it 👏👏👏

author: P𝔥𝔢𝔬𝔫𝔦𝔵
text: #SUHO_GreySuit @weareoneEXO #SUHO path to your heart and every piece of you is captured by the one you loved, its something greater than imagining it a struggle that you want to dispose of...you have never fell in love by time you will learn how to love.. Cotton

author: P𝔥𝔢𝔬𝔫𝔦𝔵
text:
#SUHO_GreySuit
@weareoneEXO Love is Hurdle?! Well then you didn't fall in love...it's race of happiness, sadness, joy, hope, healing, peace, despair..heaven and hell but it was never a Hurdle.. I barely can say none of you fall in love before it's fancy but love take a path to https://t.co/pUVAirVv6x

author: P𝔥𝔢𝔬𝔫𝔦𝔵
text: #bipolar to the person who helped me from hurting myself... Now you helped to stop the overracting because of bipolar..you deserve all the respect.. Today is the 7th year and I am able to do everything...by God's gift you are the gift of my life thanks for everything you ilysm https://t.co/0M3pwPcufd

author: P𝔥𝔢𝔬𝔫𝔦𝔵
text: #bipolar to the person who helped me with my ups and downs all even through I am rough with you in private... The person who plays big role in changing my life... I am sorry for being rough with you...you needed to know that I am not normal and I will always be proud of you.. https://t.co/2XNZFYkfad

author: P𝔥𝔢𝔬𝔫𝔦𝔵
text: #bipolar never forget you are worthy to live in the way you want.. never forget that you have only one Life... Love yourself.. appreciate yourself and your family and the universe Gold's gifts... breathe in and out...relax... make sure to accept your defects accept who you are

author: P𝔥𝔢𝔬𝔫𝔦𝔵
text: #bipolar each one of us will write different story of success to prove that they are successful and they can be Good example for others but never forget the people who supported you..we don't have solo progress in each step we have people that helped us..I am grateful for them

author: P𝔥𝔢𝔬𝔫𝔦𝔵
text: God created me but I think I am mistake...I don't know how...I do have everything...I  faced lots of ups and downs but I don't think there will be someone who could love me with my bipolar I am really fine.. normal person for others..those negative thoughts drag me down...

author: P𝔥𝔢𝔬𝔫𝔦𝔵
text: #bipolar I feel I don't deserve love...even my partner was mistaken.I feel it's my fault. I feel I will ruin people's happiness..I failed in love.I failed in friendships.I failed.I don't look at my success even though I achieved a lot independent emotionally and financially ..

author: P𝔥𝔢𝔬𝔫𝔦𝔵
text: #bipolar since it's our day let's talk about the shits in my head..I want to free  my brain.I feel I don't deserve because I have bipolar.I feel I shouldn't. across my limits with life..all I need to do is working..I should keep lying to my family that none suits me ,I was right

author: P𝔥𝔢𝔬𝔫𝔦𝔵
text: #찬열 Chanyeolah don't be sad the life is too short to be sad... Wake up....Chanyeolah... I know you are not oky but remember we are here for you.. Never give up Chanyeolah....learn to be stronger.. Military made men....can you help us by making new cover in the next month

text:
#FMV #EXO 
Riches & gold
Can't fill the hole
Made in my soul
Your love is like earthquake
Shaking up my ground
But ever since i lost you
The sky is falling down.
Ever since you went away All i see is rain Every day You're not mine All I do is pray..you are on, you 're on my mind https://t.co/QJrGUgfMLH

author: P𝔥𝔢𝔬𝔫𝔦𝔵
text: #StopWars #prayersForUkraine #PeaceForTheWorld Shame on you, Iraq is the richest country with culture, power, money, art and education, None of people told you that many of European theives stole the statues, gold and silver and many precious stuffs to Louvre Museum in Paris

author: P𝔥𝔢𝔬𝔫𝔦𝔵
text: #SUHOs_Resume_For_EXOL @weareoneEXO I am crying because I am happy... I have never been so happy.. I am thankful for God.. I am happy.. I feel so happy to see him.. All the fears fade away.. All the darkness vanished, I am happy I will support you in everything with anyone 😭🥺😭

author: P𝔥𝔢𝔬𝔫𝔦𝔵
text: #SUHO #JUNMYEON @weareoneEXO you are precious more than you think..it's stupid idea to compare you with things that don't last forever.. You are precious and so dear to the level that we can love life and watch it in a beautiful look through your eyes...know you are worthy

author: P𝔥𝔢𝔬𝔫𝔦𝔵
text: #SUHO @weareoneEXO #Junmyeon be aware that nothing can ever change our love for you and for Exo...it's about selfish love it's about watching you smile.. Watching your heart flying with happiness and joy.. It's not about greedy desires towards your name or your body.. Soulmate https://t.co/zwpPxavenv

author: P𝔥𝔢𝔬𝔫𝔦𝔵
text: #SUHO @weareoneEXO wich kind of battles.. Even living in this life without you is a battle...facing the world is battle for people who don't Want anything in this life except seeing you happy even if you were the worst person in the world.. You are the life do whatever you want https://t.co/zwpPxavenv
